comments: This is the absolute worse professor. Avoid him at all costs. Do not even take him as a last resort. His grading style is literally whatever he wants. No logic. He doesnt have any idea what APA is and marks your wrong when its correct. He does not care about the students. I heard he writes all his reviews on here to get people to take his class.

comments: I took Gordon and felt I must respond - the student who got an A- minus complaining? He does not have "so many papers" I took his 301 and he has ONE paper. Professor Gordon HELPED me get an internship, study abroad, and into the MBA program. I took him for 201 & 301. He\'s great professor! If you can\'t write, he will give you the can\'t write grade.

comments: Dr. Gordon is a great guy. I took him for 201, 301 & his sales class. Hes kind of intimidating if you cant write he shows no mercy, but I cant complain as his feedback made sense. I loved the audio comments on all your papers VERY HELPFUL. The guy has a lot of real world experience which helps in class explaining things. Go to office hours!

Gordon helped me with every assignment and gave me extra assignments to practice, and Im sure I would not have done as well without his help. I ended up getting an SLC internship because he pushed me. Only complaint is there are too many people in his office and his 301 classes are full

comments: Very tough professor. I do not recommend taking him because he is a very tough grader and it\'s either his way or the highway. BUAD301 case studies are very subjective and he lacks that understanding. Quizzes are very vague and based on large portions of readings. After you take the case study he explains what to look for and what not to do.

comments: Professor Gordon is a Passionate professor who is willing to help students who are struggling in his course. When you take his course be prepare to work hard passing your writing assignments because he won\'t give out As that easy. There is a Direct, Executive Summary, Negative, Persuasive, Research Paper, Oral Presentation, Portfolio, final.

comments: Professor G is a really good man, so take him! As an international student, I kept going to his office hours and he would always help me. Yes, the class is hard, but you can do it. He\'s there to help everyone, so go see him. He\'s harsh on grammar, but he only does that because he cares about you. You earn your grade in his class, so work hard.

comments: Professor G is very helpful and wants everyone to do well in his class. He gives tons of feedback (both written and verbal) on your tests. He gives A\'s to people that work hard for it so don\'t slack off and try your hardest. Go see him if you\'re struggling. He\'s always willing to help. I\'m glad I took his class and would honestly take him again.

comments: Prof. G is a great lecturer, but if you take his class be prepared to work ridiculously hard for your grade. He won\'t hand out A\'s unless you are a PERFECT writer. If English is your second language, he will show no mercy. The class left me frustrated. In the end I gave up because any extra effort was never reflected in the gradebook. :(
